content: the cat heart is a freebie underneath the download option you see the link to the complete alphabet in ebook pdf file that is from a to z including the free heart each letter and this heart is 30 stitches wide and 29 row high if you want to make a name for example sam you need 3x 30= 90+2 for the borders or 32 wide and then up high 3 x 29 =87 if you do it vertical you can make a small pillow with two sides different letters or the free catheart letters sold separately on ravelry with more letters you can really make anything for children who have to learn the alphabet it is also very nice to make lettercubes or all little pillows but you can make so much with more letters you can really make anything a name banner table runner pillow cushion cover a scarf or with all the letters a nice big blanket you name it every letter and this heart has two charts one with double_crochet on the sides and one with single_crochet on the sides both charts are in the file including written instructions on both version as on photo yarn 2 different colors the example is crocheted with we love yarn acryl on hook size 3 5 the size is approx 18x18 cm 1 square is about 18 grams of yarn +/- 54 meters if you make an end border you can enlarge it you may need extra yarn for this different yarn will affect the size and yarn needed but the pattern will remain the same the whole alphabet is available as a ebook you can contact me on messenger or facebook enjoy making something beautifull
